root.name: Supreme Ruler 2010
root.description: Supreme Ruler 2010 presents players with the chance to lead a nation in a fragmented world. The player attempts to dominate on an ever increasing map to dominate the world by mastering military, diplomatic and economic doctrines. PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows® 98/Me/2000/XP/Vista/Windows® 7Processor: Pentium III 400 or higherMemory: 256MB RAMGraphics: 3D Graphics Card with 8MB Video RAM (32MB AGP Video Recommended)DirectX®: DirectX 8.1 (included) or HigherSound: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
